snippet: I’m not the only teacher who, facing down an angry student, worries that he could come back firing off more than snide comments.
abstract: Op-Ed article by sociology teacher Alexandrea J Ravenelle recounts how, after the school shooting in Cleveland, she fears that an angry student in her own classroom will come back firing off more than snide comments to her; holds that every school shooting chips away at the levels of trust and openness that are necessary for teaching.
lead_paragraph: I’m not the only teacher who, facing down an angry student, worries that he could come back firing off more than snide comments.

headline.main: Each Teacher Wonders, Is This the One?
headline.print_headline: Each Teacher Wonders, Is This the One?
